Topic.Title: Public Debt has more than Doubled under the Obama Administration

Message.Msg: "The United States public debt is the money borrowed by the federal government of the United States through the issuing of securities by the Treasury and other federal government agencies. US public debt consists of two components:[1] Debt held by the public includes Treasury securities held by investors outside the federal government, including that held by individuals, corporations, the Federal Reserve System and foreign, state and local governments. Debt held by government accounts or intragovernmental debt includes non-marketable Treasury securities held in accounts administered by the federal government that are owed to program beneficiaries, such as the Social Security Trust Fund. Debt held by government accounts represents the cumulative surpluses, including interest earnings, of these accounts that have been invested in Treasury securities."

Topic.Title: Gold will always be gold... what will your paper stock certificates ever be but paper!

Message.Msg: Gold Is only a commodity. It only has value if someone has a use for it or if you want to agree to use it as a medium of exchange. You can do the same thing with paper or seashells or big round stones if you wish. The gold bugs have done a very good sales job on those who live in paranoia, selling them the idea that in a catastrophe gold will for some reason have more value than food, or any other needed commodity or that it will be easily accepted as a medium of exchange. The people who believed this have taken heavy loses in recent weeks.
